brand_identity.name: My Coach Developer
design_principles: Clarity over Decoration: Every pixel must serve the observation task.
Low Cognitive Load: Interface must disappear during observation.
Touch-First: Buttons must be large (min 44px, preferred 64px+) for outdoor/iPad use.
High Contrast: Visible in bright sunlight (outdoor coaching).

headings.usage: Page titles, Session names, Modal headers

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.event_action: bg-accent-event_yellow text-black hover:bg-accent-event_yellow_hover h-24 w-full rounded-xl font-bold text-lg shadow-md border-b-4 border-yellow-600 active:border-b-0 active:translate-y-1 transition-all
buttons.descriptor: h-16 w-full rounded-lg font-medium text-sm transition-all border-2 hover:brightness-95 active:scale-95

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow p-6

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-transparent bg-white

observation_screen.layout_strategy: Three-column layout. Left: Content Focus Descriptors (Blue). Center: Event Buttons (Yellow). Right: Delivery Method Descriptors (Green). Top Bar: Timer, Session Part Toggle, Ball Rolling Toggle.
observation_screen.ball_rolling_toggle: Toggle switch or large distinct button. Orange when active.
observation_screen.session_parts: Segmented control or Tabs: Warm up | Practice | Game | Reflection.

data_storage.strategy: Local Storage (IndexedDB or localStorage). Offline first.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for the main background; keep it flat and clean for outdoor visibility.
Ensure all touch targets are at least 44x44px.
Implement 'Undo' as a floating action button or prominent top-bar button.
No analytics dashboards (keep it to raw data/timeline review).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Set up the 'Code Window' as the core feature. It must be a responsive grid. 2. Use the 'Manrope' font for headings. 3. Implement the 'Yellow' event buttons with the specific 'event_action' class defined in components. 4. Ensure the app works offline.
